content:
Based on the description of Aster, it appears that the main goal of the app is to help companies improve their team engagement and culture by providing real-time insights into team sentiment. This can help companies identify potential problems before they escalate and become retention issues, and take steps to address them in order to create a healthier and happier work environment. Some potential goals for the app could include:

1. Helping companies identify areas where team engagement and culture may be suffering, and providing recommendations for addressing those issues.
2. Providing real-time insights into team sentiment, so that companies can monitor the health of their team and respond to any issues as they arise.
3. Offering actionable recommendations for improving team engagement and culture, based on the insights provided by the app.
4. Helping companies to be more accountable, informed, and empowered to understand their people, so that they can make more effective decisions when it comes to managing their teams.
5. Providing a platform for teams to share their thoughts and feedback in a safe and confidential way, so that companies can better understand their needs and concerns.

Overall, the goal of Aster appears to be to help companies create a better work environment for their employees, by providing the insights and tools they need to identify and address issues related to engagement and culture.
